places.name: Children's Discovery Museum
places.description: Interactive exhibits designed for young minds with hands-on learning experiences. Perfect for curious toddlers who love to explore and touch everything!
places.specialNotes: Birthday party packages available, stroller parking provided. Check website for current hours.

yunsolExperience.likes: Interactive exhibits kept Yunsol engaged for hours! The water play area was a huge hit.
yunsolExperience.dislikes: Can get quite crowded on weekends, and some exhibits were too advanced for her age.
yunsolExperience.personalNotes: Best visited on weekday mornings. Bring extra clothes for the water play area. The butterfly garden was Yunsol's absolute favorite!

places.name: Local Park with Playground
places.description: Safe playground equipment with soft surfaces and age-appropriate structures. Great for burning energy and meeting other families.
places.parkingInfo: Free street parking and small lot
places.foodOptions: Picnic tables available, bring your own food
places.specialNotes: Great for meeting other families, dog-friendly area nearby. Check website for current hours.

yunsolExperience.likes: Great open space for running around. Yunsol loved the swings and made friends easily.
yunsolExperience.dislikes: Limited shade on hot days, and the playground equipment gets very hot in summer.
yunsolExperience.personalNotes: Perfect for morning visits. Bring sunscreen and water. The picnic area is great for snacks between play sessions.

places.name: Baby & Me Swimming Classes
places.description: Warm water pools with certified instructors who specialize in infant and toddler swimming. A wonderful bonding experience!
places.specialNotes: Bring swim diapers, towels provided, family changing rooms available. Check website for current hours.

places.name: Petting Zoo & Farm
places.description: Gentle animals and farm experiences designed for little ones. Watch your toddler's face light up meeting friendly farm animals!
places.bestTimeToVisit: Weekend mornings for animal feeding time
places.foodOptions: Picnic area available, snack bar with basic items
places.specialNotes: Seasonal activities include pumpkin patch and berry picking. Check website for current hours.

yunsolExperience.likes: Yunsol was absolutely delighted meeting the baby goats! She giggled non-stop feeding the sheep.
yunsolExperience.dislikes: Got a bit overwhelmed by the larger animals like the cow. The goose was too aggressive for her comfort.
yunsolExperience.personalNotes: Start with the smaller, gentler animals first. Bring hand sanitizer - they provide it but it's always good to have extra. The pumpkin patch in fall was magical!

places.name: Toddler Story Time at Library
places.description: Interactive story sessions with songs, fingerplays, and simple crafts. Perfect for developing language skills and love for books.
places.bestTimeToVisit: Story time: Tuesdays 10:30 AM, Thursdays 11:00 AM
places.foodOptions: No food allowed, water fountains available
places.specialNotes: Registration not required, arrive 10 minutes early for best spots. Check website for current hours.

yunsolExperience.likes: Yunsol loves the interactive songs and rhymes. She always tries to copy the hand movements.
yunsolExperience.dislikes: Sometimes gets shy with so many other kids around. Can be difficult if she's in a fussy mood.
yunsolExperience.personalNotes: Thursday sessions tend to be smaller and less overwhelming. Bring her favorite small book to share. Sit near the back if she needs space to move around.

places.name: Indoor Soft Play Center
places.description: Climate-controlled play areas with soft obstacles, ball pits, and safe climbing structures perfect for active toddlers.
places.parkingInfo: Free parking in shopping center lot
places.foodOptions: Cafe with healthy snacks and coffee for parents
places.specialNotes: Birthday party packages available, toddler-only areas during certain hours. Check website for current hours.

places.name: Bellevue Downtown Park
places.description: Lushly planted city park featuring a 240-foot-wide waterfall, a picnic green & a playground. Perfect for family outings with wide open spaces, peaceful walking paths, and the famous Inspiration Playground designed for all abilities.
places.parkingInfo: Free parking available in multiple lots including Southern Parking Lot
places.bestTimeToVisit: Weekday mornings or late afternoons (less crowded)
places.foodOptions: Picnic areas available, bring your own food. Nearby restaurants in downtown Bellevue
places.specialNotes: Features the famous 240-foot waterfall, duck pond, and the Inspiration Playground. Dog-friendly with designated areas. Great for jogging, walking, or family picnics. Open 24 hours.

yunsolExperience.likes: The waterfall is mesmerizing for Yunsol! She could watch the ducks for hours and loves the Inspiration Playground.
yunsolExperience.dislikes: The walking paths can be long for little legs. Some areas get muddy after rain.
yunsolExperience.personalNotes: The duck pond is magical in the morning. Bring breadcrumbs (if allowed) and a stroller for the longer walks. The playground is perfect for her age group - safe but challenging!

tips.title: Pack Smart
tips.description: Always bring snacks, water, extra clothes, and favorite comfort items. A well-packed bag can save the day!

tips.title: Time It Right
tips.description: Plan outings around nap times and meal schedules. Happy, well-rested toddlers make for better adventures!

tips.title: Safety First
tips.description: Research the venue beforehand, check for toddler-proofing, and always keep a close eye on your little explorer.

tips.title: Have a Backup Plan
tips.description: Weather changes, meltdowns happen! Always have an indoor alternative or know when it's time to head home.
